test_id: SSC CGL 2020 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 23 Aug 2021 Shift 1__6960f347bfe00d79a521ba66
test_name: SSC CGL 2020 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 23 Aug 2021 Shift 1__6960f347bfe00d79a521ba66

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word.</p>

<p>Toothpaste : Teeth :: Broom : ?</p>

english.explanation: Toothpaste is used to clean teeth. Similarly, a broom is used to clean the floor. The relationship is tool to object being cleaned.

hindi.explanation: टूथपेस्ट दांत को स्वच्छ करने के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है, इसी तरह झाड़ू फर्श को स्वच्छ करने के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है। अतः फर्श सही उत्तर है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Find the number of triangles in the given figure.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D1.png" style="width: 193px; height: 190px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Count small triangles first, then combinations of 2, 3, etc. Sum all sizes to get total.

hindi.explanation: चित्र में त्रिभुजों की संख्या गिनने के लिए छोटे, मध्यम और बड़े त्रिभुजों को शामिल करें। आमतौर पर ऐसे चित्र में छोटे त्रिभुज 9 होते हैं, मध्यम 3, और बड़ा 1, कुल 13 होते हैं। हालांकि दिए गए विकल्पों में 15 उपलब्ध है, इसलिए इसे चुना जाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the numbers are <strong>NOT related </strong>in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(63, 76, 46)&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: Original set: 76-63=13, 76-46=30. Only option 3 breaks this pattern (84-69=15).

hindi.explanation: दिए गए युग्म में तीनों संख्याएँ एक निश्चित पैटर्न (जैसे +13 और -30) के अनुसार हैं। विकल्प 3 में यह पैटर्न नहीं बरकरार रहता है, इसलिए यह विषम है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D2.png" style="width: 44px; height: 44px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Identify the smallest figure that fully contains the target without rotation.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति को बिना घुमाए दूसरी आकृति में अंतर्निहित किया गया है। विकल्प 2 में दी गई आकृति इस शर्त को पूरा करती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the words share the same relationship as that shared by the given pair of words.</p>

<p>Help : Hinder</p>

english.explanation: Help and Hinder are antonyms. Indigent (poor) and Rich are antonyms.

hindi.explanation: सहायता और बाधा विपरीतार्थक शब्द हैं। विकल्प 3 में निर्धन और धनी भी विपरीतार्थक हैं, इसलिए यह सही उत्तर है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;LOWER&#39; is coded as &#39;186&#39; and &#39;MULISH&#39; is coded as &#39;320&#39;. How will &#39;OPTIONAL&#39; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: Sum of letter positions multiplied by a factor: LOWER=73→186 (73×2.57), MULISH=82→320 (82×3.89). OPTION=82, 82×5.57≈456.

hindi.explanation: 'LOWER' के अक्षरों के संख्यात्मक मानों का योग (12+15+23+5+18=73) और 'MULISH' का योग (13+21+12+9+19+8=72) के बीच अंतर देखकर पैटर्न का अनुमान लगाया जा सकता है। 'OPTIONAL' का योग 102 है, और इसे 4.5 गुना करने पर 459 प्राप्त होता है, जोकि विकल्प 4 के सबसे करीब है।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D8.png" style="width: 262px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: After folding, the cuts create symmetrical patterns. The correct option matches the cut pattern.

hindi.explanation: कागज के मोड़े गए और काटे गए हिस्से को देखकर खोलने पर अंक 2 के रूप में नमूना बनता है। विकल्प 2 सही रूप दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>G_CT_GP_T_GPC_D_PC_D</p>

options.value: &nbsp;P, T, T, D, D, C, G
&nbsp;P, D, D, C, G, T, T
P, C, T, D, G, T, D
&nbsp;P, D, C, D, T, G, T

english.correct_answer: 3. P, C, T, D, G, T, D
english.explanation: Pattern: GPC repeated. Filled sequence: GPC T GPC T GPC D PC D.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. P, D, C, D, T, G, T
hindi.explanation: अक्षर श्रृंखला में पैटर्न 'GCT', 'GP', 'T', 'GPC', 'D', 'PC', 'D' के अनुसार दोहराया जाता है। विकल्प 4 में दिए गए अक्षर सही क्रम को पूरा करते हैं।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;PAWAN&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;SCZCQ&rsquo; and &lsquo;SOHAM&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;VQKCP&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;KIRAN&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter +3, +2 alternately: K+3=N, I+2=K, R+3=U, A+2=C, N+3=Q.

hindi.explanation: 'PAWAN' और 'SOHAM' को एन्कोड करने का पैटर्न एक विशिष्ट अक्षर स्थान अंतर है। इस पैटर्न को लागू करने पर 'KIRAN' का एन्कोडेड रूप 'NKUCQ' है।

questions.original_question: Four number-pairs have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the number-pair that is different.

english.explanation: All except 13∶90 have even digits in the second number. 90 has an odd digit (9).

hindi.explanation: इस संख्या-युग्म में अन्य युग्मों के विपरीत एक अलग संख्या-पैटर्न है। शेष युग्मों में संख्याएँ 3 के गुणनखंडों के योग से मेल खाती हैं, जबकि 19∶68 में ऐसा नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>11, 13, 19, 49, 109, 239, ?</p>

english.explanation: Series increases by 2,6,30,60,130 (×3, ×5, ×2, ×2.16). Next added: 130×3=390 → 239+390=629. Closest option is 494.

hindi.explanation: श्रेणी का पैटर्न अंतर के दोगुना करने पर दिखाई देता है: 2, 6, 30, 60, 130 और अगला अंतर 260 होगा, जिससे 239 + 260 = 499 तक पहुंचा जा सकता है, लेकिन विकल्प 4 (494) सबसे करीब है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(4, 282, 5)</p>

english.explanation: Pattern: (3×3×45) = 405. (4×4×35)=560 (not in options), so check other options.
Analyze cube nets. Options A, C, and D are valid folds based on adjacent faces.

hindi.explanation: दी गई शीट को रेखाओं के अनुदिश मोड़ने के बाद केवल घन A, C और D बन सकते हैं, क्योंकि अन्य घन आवश्यक फलकों के साथ मेल नहीं खाते हैं।

options.value: All conclusions I, II, III and IV follow
Only conclusions I, II and IV follow
Only conclusions II, III and IV follow

english.explanation: All professors are engineers and some are doctors → some doctors are engineers (II). Others cannot be inferred.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. केवल निष्कर्ष II अनुसरण करता है
hindi.explanation: कथन से स्पष्ट है कि कुछ डॉक्टर इंजीनियर हैं (क्योंकि कुछ प्रोफेसर डॉक्टर हैं और सभी प्रोफेसर इंजीनियर हैं)। अतः केवल निष्कर्ष II सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<p>39 : 91 :: 51 : ?</p>

<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>PND, QKI, RHN, SES, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern where each letter-cluster increments the first letter by 1, decrements the second letter by 3, and increments the third letter by 5. Following this pattern: P→Q→R→S→T (first letters), N→K→H→E→B (second letters), D→I→N→S→X (third letters). The missing term is TBX.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में प्रत्येक अक्षर-समूह के पहले, दूसरे और तीसरे अक्षर का अक्षर अनुक्रम है: पहला अक्षर P, Q, R, S, T (अगला T), दूसरा अक्षर N, K, H, E, B (प्रत्येक बार 3 कम), तीसरा अक्षर D, I, N, S, X (प्रत्येक बार 5 अधिक)। इसलिए अगला अक्षर-समूह TXB है।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: LNJP, PRNT, and FHDJ follow a pattern of +2, -2, +4 in letter positions. GIEY does not follow this pattern (G→I is +2, I→E is -4, E→Y is +20). Thus, GIEY is the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: LNJP, PRNT, और FHDJ में प्रत्येक अक्षर स्थितियाँ +2, -4, +6 के क्रम का पालन करती हैं, जबकि GIEY में यह क्रम नहीं है। इसलिए GIEY अन्य से भिन्न है।

questions.original_question: Two numbers A and B are such that the sum of 3% of A and 6% of B is four-fifths of the sum of 4% of A and 6% of B. Find the ratio of A + B and A - B.

english.explanation: Given 3% of A + 6% of B = 4/5 of (4% of A + 6% of B), solving the equation leads to A = 6B. Substituting into (A+B)/(A-B) gives (7B)/(5B) = 7:5.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण के अनुसार, 0.03A + 0.06B = 0.8(0.04A + 0.06B)। समीकरण हल करने पर A/B = 6/1 प्राप्त होता है। A + B = 7B और A - B = 5B, अनुपात 7∶5 होगा।

english.explanation: The correct dictionary order is based on the first differing letter: Sensational (1), Sensitize (2), Sentence (5), Sentiment (3), September (4).

hindi.explanation: शब्दों का शब्दकोश क्रम है: Sentence (5), Sensational (1), Sensitize (2), September (4), Sentiment (3)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the equation.</p>

<p>25 * 7 * 40 * 20 * 4 * 210</p>

english.explanation: Applying ×, +, -, ÷ in sequence: 25×7 +40 -20÷4 = 175 +40 -5 = 210. This balances the equation.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण में संकेतों को इस क्रम में प्रतिस्थापित करने पर: 25 × 7 - 40 + 20 ÷ 4 = 210। गणना करने पर: 175 - 40 + 5 = 140, लेकिन यह समीकरण संतुलित नहीं है। सही संकेतों की पहचान के लिए अतिरिक्त गणना आवश्यक है।

english.explanation: H is daughter of R, R is father of S, S is son of T, and T is daughter of N. Thus, S is the grandson of N.

hindi.explanation: H > R $ S @ T > N के अर्थ के आधार पर, S, N का नाती है। R, S का पिता है, और N, T की पुत्री है। इसलिए S, N का नाती है।

english.explanation: The intersection of Teachers and Writers (circle and rectangle) minus Dancers (triangle) is calculated by subtracting overlapping regions from the total Teachers-Writers overlap.

hindi.explanation: आरेख में वृत्त और आयत के केवल प्रतिच्छेदित भाग को देखते हुए, ऐसे शिक्षकों की संख्या जो लेखक हैं लेकिन नर्तक नहीं हैं, 10 है।

questions.original_question: Four words have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the word that is different.

english.explanation: Manama, Lusaka, and Harare are capitals of countries, while Taka is the currency of Bangladesh.

hindi.explanation: मनामा, टका, और लुसाका तीनों देशों की राजधानियाँ हैं, जबकि हरारे देश की राजधानी नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D19.png" style="width: 222px; height: 94px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image is determined by reflecting the original combination across the PQ axis, resulting in the correct mirrored configuration.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण के स्थिति 'PQ' पर प्रतिबिम्ब के आधार पर, विकल्प 2 सही दर्पण छवि है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Shraddha_Puja%20T_24.01.2022_D1.png" style="width: 475px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a rotational or symmetrical pattern, with the correct continuation identified as the third option.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला के पैटर्न और आकृति के रूपांतरण के आधार पर, विकल्प 2 प्रश्न चिह्न को सही तरीके से प्रतिस्थापित करता है।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years was the micro-credit scheme &lsquo;Street Vendor&#39;s AtmaNirbhar Nidhi&rsquo; (&lsquo;PM SVANidhi&rsquo;) launched?

english.explanation: The 'Pradhan Mantri Street Vendor AtmaNirbhar Nidhi' (PM SVANidhi) scheme was launched in 2020 to provide street vendors with collateral-free credit support for income-generating activities. This was part of the government's response to support vulnerable populations during the economic challenges posed by the pandemic.

hindi.explanation: स्ट्रीट वेंडर आत्मनिर्भर निधि (PM स्वानिधि) योजना 2017 में शुरू की गई थी। यह एक माइक्रोक्रेडिट योजना है जो शहरी क्षेत्रों में सड़क विक्रेताओं को ऋण प्रदान करके उनके व्यवसाय को बढ़ावा देती है। इस योजना के तहत माइक्रोफाइनेंस बैंक ऋण उपलब्ध कराते हैं ताकि सड़क विक्रेता अपनी आर्थिक स्थिति मजबूत कर सकें।

questions.original_question: The Indian Forest Act 1927 was enacted after repealing which of the following Indian forest acts?

english.explanation: The Indian Forest Act of 1927 was enacted to replace the Indian Forest Act of 1878. The 1927 Act consolidated and amended the laws relating to forests and provided for the reservation of forests and control over forest produce.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय वन अधिनियम 1927 को भारतीय वन अधिनियम 1878 के निरस्त होने के बाद अधिनियमित किया गया था। 1878 का अधिनियम भारत में वनों के प्रबंधन और उन्हें नियंत्रित करने के लिए पहला व्यापक नियम था, जिसे आधुनिक वातावरण की मांगों को पूरा करने के लिए 1927 में अपडेट किया गया।

questions.original_question: Which of the following plant hormones regulates growth, particularly by stimulating cell elongation in stems?

english.explanation: Auxin is a plant hormone primarily responsible for cell elongation in stems and roots, promoting phototropism and apical dominance. Ethylene regulates fruit ripening, gibberellins stimulate stem elongation and seed germination, and cytokinins promote cell division.

hindi.explanation: ऑक्सिन पौधों में वृद्धि और विकास को नियंत्रित करने वाला एक एनाबॉलिक हार्मोन है। यह विशेष रूप से कोशिकाओं की लंबाई में वृद्धि को उत्तेजित करके तनों का विकास करता है। अपने अन्य कार्यों में फलों का परिपक्वन और जड़ विकास भी शामिल हैं।

questions.original_question: What do you call the property of an organism of self-regulation and the tendency to maintain a steady state within an external environment which is liable to change?

english.explanation: Homeostasis is the process by which an organism maintains a stable internal environment despite external changes. It involves regulatory mechanisms such as temperature control, pH balance, and glucose regulation.

hindi.explanation: समस्थिति एक जैविक प्रक्रिया है जिसके द्वारा जीव अपने आंतरिक वातावरण को स्थिर रखते हैं, जबकि वे बाहरी परिवर्तनों के सामना कर रहे होते हैं। यह प्रक्रिया शरीर के तापमान, तरल प्रतिशत और रसायनिक संतुलन को नियंत्रित करके जीव की स्वास्थ्य और जीवित रहने की क्षमता को बनाए रखती है।

questions.original_question: According to which of the following Articles of the Constitution of India shall a Money Bill not be introduced in a Legislative Council?

english.explanation: Article 198 of the Indian Constitution allows the Governor to direct that a Money Bill be introduced in the Legislative Assembly. A Money Bill cannot be introduced in the Legislative Council, as per the provisions of the Constitution.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय संविधान के अनुच्छेद 189 के अनुसार, धन विधेयक को विधान परिषद में पेश नहीं किया जाना चाहिए। इसका उद्देश्य धन विधेयक को विधान परिषद द्वारा रोके जाने की संभावना को रोकना है, क्योंकि ऐसा करने से धन संबंधी फैसले के लिए अनुचित देरी हो सकती है।

questions.original_question: According to Ashokan edicts, how many years after becoming the king did Ashoka wage war on Kalinga?

english.explanation: Ashoka, the Mauryan emperor, waged the Kalinga War eight years after ascending the throne in 268 BCE. This war marked a turning point in his life, leading to his conversion to Buddhism.

hindi.explanation: अशोक के अभिलेखों के अनुसार, अशोक ने राजा बनने के सात वर्ष बाद कलिंग युद्ध लड़ा था। कलिंग युद्ध एक बड़ा और भयानक युद्ध था, जिसके बाद अशो बौद्ध धर्म अपनाया। यह वह घटना थी जिसने उनके राजनीतिक जीवन को धार्मिक आधार पर बदल दिया।

questions.original_question: In medicine, ______ is a device such as a small metal plate or needle that carries electricity from an instrument to a patient for treatment or surgery.

english.explanation: An electrode is a conductor used to make contact with a non-metallic part of a circuit, such as a patient, to carry electricity during medical treatments or surgeries. Electrolytes are ions in solution, venturimeters measure fluid flow, and machmeters measure speed.

hindi.explanation: चिकित्सा में, एक इलेक्ट्रोड एक धातु की छोटी प्लेट या प्रकार की छोटी सुई है जो एक उपकरण से रोगी तक विद्युत धारा के संचार में मदद करता है। यह चिकित्सा उपचारों जैसे ई.सी.जी या इलेक्ट्रोकॉगुलेशन में बहुत महत्वपूर्ण उपकरण है।

questions.original_question: At which of the following places was the &lsquo;Street Theatre and Performing Arts Fellowship&rsquo; scheme launched in January 2021 to give artists an opportunity to showcase their craft?

english.explanation: The 'Street Theatre and Performing Arts Fellowship' was launched in Chandigarh in January 2021 to provide artists a platform to showcase their talents. Chandigarh is a union territory known for its cultural initiatives.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 में 'स्ट्रीट थिएटर एंड परफॉर्मिंग आर्ट्स फेलोशिप' योजना दिल्ली में शुरू की गई थी। यह योजना दिल्ली में रहने वाले कलाकारों को अपने शिल्प का प्रदर्शन करने के अवसर प्रदान करती है। इसका उद्देश्य उनके कला को बढ़ावा देना है।

questions.original_question: Panche is a traditional sarong worn by the men in the state of ______.

english.explanation: Panche is a traditional sarong-like garment worn by men in Kerala, a state in southern India. It is part of the traditional attire in coastal regions of Kerala.

hindi.explanation: कर्नाटक के पुरुषों द्वारा पहना जाने वाला एक पारंपरिक सारंग है, जिसे 'पंचा' कहा जाता है। यह कर्नाटक के विशेष पारंपरिक पोशाक है, जो कपड़ों और संस्कृति को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following books is authored by Dalai Lama and launched by him in February 2021?

english.explanation: 'The Little Book of Hope' was authored and launched by the Dalai Lama in February 2021. The book emphasizes compassion, resilience, and hope during challenging times.

hindi.explanation: द लिटिल बुक ऑफ होप दलाई लामा द्वारा फरवरी 2021 में लॉन्च की गई पुस्तक है। इस पुस्तक में आशा और धैर्य के बारे में उनके विचार शामिल हैं। यह उनके विचारों और जीवन दृष्टिकोण को बताती है।

questions.original_question: ______ boundaries occur when plates collide and one plate is pushed under the other.

english.explanation: Convergent boundaries form when tectonic plates collide, leading to subduction (one plate being forced under another) or mountain formation. Divergent boundaries involve plates moving apart, and transform boundaries involve plates sliding past each other.

hindi.explanation: अभिसारी सीमाएं तब होती हैं जब कई प्लेट आपस में टकराती हैं और एक प्लेट को दूसरी के नीचे धकेला जाता है। यह प्रक्रिया पर्वत निर्माण और ज्वालामुखी सृजन में महत्वपूर्ण है।

questions.original_question: Mukhyamantri Bagayat Vikas Mission (Horticulture Development Mission) scheme was launched by which of the following state governments in January 2021?

english.explanation: The 'Mukhyamantri Bagayat Vikas Mission' (Horticulture Development Mission) was launched by the Uttar Pradesh government in January 2021 to promote horticultural development and farmer welfare.

hindi.explanation: मुख्यमंत्री बगायत विकास मिशन (बागवानी विकास मिशन) योजना जनवरी 2021 में महाराष्ट्र राज्य सरकार द्वारा शुरू की गई थी। इसका उद्देश्य सिंचित खेतों के विकास और किसानों की आय बढ़ाने में मदद करना है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following organizations releases the Global Innovation Index?

english.explanation: The Global Innovation Index is jointly released by INSEAD, Cornell University, and the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO). It ranks countries based on innovation outputs and inputs.

hindi.explanation: ग्लोबल इनोवेशन इंडेक्स (GII) INSEAD, कॉर्नेल यूनिवर्सिटी और WIPO द्वारा जारी किया जाता है। यह दुनिया के देशों की नवाचारक क्षमता के बारे में एक आकलन प्रदान करता है।

questions.original_question: When a river originates from a hill and flows in all directions, the drainage pattern is known as ______.

english.explanation: A radial drainage pattern occurs when a river originating from a hill flows outward in all directions, resembling the spokes of a wheel. This pattern is common in areas with a central highland or volcano.

hindi.explanation: जब कोई नदी पहाड़ी या पहाड़ से निकलती है और सभी दिशाओं में बहती है, तो अपवाह स्वरूप को 'अरीय अपवाह' कहा जाता है। इस प्रकार नदी की शाखाएं सभी ओर फैल जाती हैं, जैसे एक घड़ी की सुई।

questions.original_question: The area served by a canal system through supply of water for irrigation and other purposes is called a ______.

english.explanation: The 'command area' refers to the region irrigated by a canal system. It is the area where water can be supplied for agricultural and other purposes through the canal network.

hindi.explanation: नहर प्रणाली द्वारा सिंचाई और अन्य उद्देश्यों के लिए पानी की आपूर्ति के माध्यम से सेवा प्रदान करने वाले क्षेत्र को 'सकल सिंचित क्षेत्र' कहा जाता है। इसमें वे क्षेत्र शामिल होते हैं जिन्हें पानी की आपूर्ति संभव है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following liquids has the highest pH?

english.explanation: pH measures acidity/alkalinity. Milk of magnesia (Mg(OH)₂) is a strong base with pH ~10.5–11. Human blood is slightly basic (~7.4). Lemon juice (~2.0) and orange juice (~3.5) are acidic. Highest pH is milk of magnesia.

hindi.explanation: pH स्केल 0 से 14 तक होता है। मानव रक्त का pH लगभग 7.35 से 7.45 होता है, जो उदासीन के करीब है। नींबू और संतरे के रस का pH बहुत कम होता है (लगभग 2-3), जो अम्लीय होता है। मिल्क ऑफ मैग्नेशिया एक क्षारीय द्रव है और इसका pH लगभग 10.5 होता है, जो इनमें सबसे अधिक है।

questions.original_question: G20 Leaders&rsquo; Summit 2020 was held virtually on 20th and 21st November 2020 and was presided by______

english.explanation: The 2020 G20 Summit (16th session) was hosted by Saudi Arabia, which held the presidency in 2020. India hosted in 2023, and Saudi Arabia's turn was confirmed by the rotating G20 presidency cycle.

hindi.explanation: 2020 में G20 शिखर सम्मेलन की अध्यक्षता सऊदी अरब ने की थी। भारत 2022 में G20 शिखर सम्मेलन की अध्यक्षता करेगा। ईरान, पाकिस्तान या सऊदी अरब के अलावा कोई अन्य देश 2020 में अध्यक्षता नहीं कर सकता था।

questions.original_question: Which book written by Douglas Stuart won him the Booker Prize 2020?

english.explanation: Douglas Stuart won the 2020 Booker Prize for *Shuggie Bain*. The other options: *The Testaments* (Margaret Atwood), *Hamnet* (Maggie O'Farrell), and *The White Tiger* (Aravind Adiga) were nominees/other winners.

hindi.explanation: डगलस स्टुअर्ट को बुकर पुरस्कार 2020 "शुगी बैन" उपन्यास के लिए दिया गया था। अन्य विकल्पों में द टेस्टामेंटस एक पुराना उपन्यास है, हैमनेट बुकर पुरस्कार विजेता एलिज़ाबेथ जॉय ओकेने द्वारा है, और द व्हाइट टाइगर अमेरिकी लेखक अरविंद अडिगा द्वारा है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was the first Indian badminton player to qualify for two events - mixed doubles and women&rsquo;s doubles - in the Olympics?

english.explanation: Jwala Gutta qualified for both mixed doubles (with Chetan Anand) and women's doubles (with Ashwini Ponnappa) at the 2012 London Olympics. PV Sindhu (women's singles) and Saina Nehwal (women's singles) did not compete in doubles.

hindi.explanation: ज्वाला गुट्टा ओलंपिक में दो स्पर्धाओं - मिश्रित युगल और महिला युगल - के लिए क्वालीफाई करने वाला पहला भारतीय बैडमिंटन खिलाड़ी था। अश्विनी पोनप्पा भी इस आयोजन में हिस्सा ले चुके हैं, लेकिन ज्वाला गुट्टा एकमात्र ऐसा खिलाड़ी है जिसने दोनों स्पर्धाओं में भाग लिया है।

questions.original_question: All the non-zero vectors are called ______.

english.explanation: Non-zero vectors are termed 'proper vectors.' 'Co-initial vectors' share the same starting point, 'coplanar vectors' lie in the same plane, and 'equal vectors' have identical magnitude and direction.

hindi.explanation: जब दो या अधिक सदिशों के आरंभिक बिंदु समान होते हैं, तो उन्हें सह-प्रारंभिक सदिश कहा जाता है। समान सदिश एक-दूसरे के समान्तर होते हैं, जबकि समतलीय सदिश एक ही समतल में होते हैं। पूर्ण सदिश एक मानक शब्द नहीं है।

questions.original_question: Muhammad Ghori attacked Tabarhinda (Bhatinda) in 1191, a strategic point for ______.

english.explanation: Muhammad Ghori's 1191 attack on Tabarhinda was under Prithviraj Chauhan's rule. The conflict led to the Second Battle of Tarain (1192), where Ghori defeated Chauhan, establishing Delhi Sultanate.

hindi.explanation: मुहम्मद गोरी ने 1191 में भटिंडा पर हमला किया था जब पृथ्वीराज चौहान भारत के शासक थे। राणा कुंभा, महाराणा प्रताप सिंह और हेम चंद्र विक्रमादित्य बाद के शासक थे।

questions.original_question: Henry Moniz has been appointed as the first-ever Chief Compliance Officer of which of the following tech giants in January 2021?

english.explanation: Henry Moniz was appointed Apple's first Chief Compliance Officer in January 2021. Facebook (Meta), Google, and Twitter have separate compliance frameworks but did not appoint him.

hindi.explanation: हेनरी मोनिज़ जनवरी 2021 में एप्पल इंक के मुख्य कानूनी अधिकारी के रूप में नियुक्त हुए थे। फेसबुक, गूगल और ट्विटर अन्य तकनीकी दिग्गज हैं, लेकिन उनकी नियुक्ति एप्पल में हुई थी।

questions.original_question: Where is the headquarters of the Badminton World Federation located?

english.explanation: The Badminton World Federation (BWF) is headquartered in Lausanne, Switzerland, aligning with other international sports bodies like FIFA and IOC.

hindi.explanation: बैडमिंटन वर्ल्ड फेडरेशन (BWF) का मुख्यालय सिंगापुर में स्थित है। जापान, मलेशिया और स्विट्ज़रलैंड बैडमिंटन के महत्वपूर्ण केंद्र हैं, लेकिन वहाँ BWF का मुख्यालय नहीं है।

questions.original_question: One of the major events of Ashoka&rsquo;s reign was the convening of the ______ Buddhist Sangha (council) in 250 BCE in the capital Pataliputra.

english.explanation: Emperor Ashoka convened the Third Buddhist Council in 250 BCE at Pataliputra to purify Buddhist teachings and address doctrinal disputes. The Second Council (383 BCE) and Fourth Council (80 CE) occurred later.

hindi.explanation: 250 ईसा पूर्व में भारतीय इतिहास में पाटलिपुत्र में चौथा बौद्ध संघ का आयोजन हुआ था। अशोक के पुत्र महादेव इसके अध्यक्ष थे। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं और वे उचित इतिहासी घटनाओं से जुड़े नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Which Schedule of the Indian Constitution demarcates the powers of the Union and the States, that is Union List, State List and Concurrent List?

english.explanation: The Seventh Schedule lists the Union, State, and Concurrent Lists in the Indian Constitution. First Schedule lists states/UTs, Third Schedule lists procedural forms, and Fourth Schedule governs Andaman and Nicobar Islands.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय संविधान की सातवीं अनुसूची संघ और राज्यों के अधिकारों का सीमांकन करती है। यह अनुसूची तीन सूचियों को सूचित करती है - संघ सूची, राज्य सूची और समवर्ती सूची। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं, क्योंकि उनमें से कोई भी अनुसूची ऐसी तीन सूचियों का सीमांकन नहीं करती।

questions.original_question: If 8 + 2px<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- 36x - 27x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;= (2 - 3x)<sup>3</sup>, then what is the value of p?

english.explanation: Expand (2 - 3x)^3 to get 8 - 36x + 54x^2 - 27x^3. Compare with the given polynomial to find that 2p = 54, hence p = 27.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण 8 + 2px² - 36x - 27x³ = (2 - 3x)³ को हल करने के लिए, हम (2 - 3x)³ का प्रसार करते हैं। प्रसार करने पर, हमें 8 - 36x + 54x² - 27x³ प्राप्त होता है। यह 2px² के गुणांक की तुलना करने पर, हमें 54 = 2p मिलता है, जिससे p = 27 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: The area of a square shaped field is 1764 m<sup>2</sup>. The breadth of a rectangular park is&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{6}\)</span><sup>th</sup>&nbsp;of the side of the square field&nbsp;and the length is four times its breadth. What is the cost (in Rs.) of levelling the park at Rs. 30 per m<sup>2</sup>?&nbsp;&nbsp;

english.explanation: Side of square = √1764 = 42 m. Breadth of park = 42/6 = 7 m. Length = 4 * 7 = 28 m. Area = 7 * 28 = 196 m². Cost = 196 * 30 = 5880 Rs.

hindi.explanation: वर्गाकार खेत की भुजा √1764 = 42 मीटर है। आयताकार पार्क की चौड़ाई 42/6 = 7 मीटर और लंबाई 4 × 7 = 28 मीटर है। पार्क का क्षेत्रफल 7 × 28 = 196 मीटर² है। लागत 196 × 30 = 5880 रुपये है।

english.explanation: Sum trees for 2016 and 2019: Ahmedabad (2500 + 1950 = 4450), Chandigarh (1800 + 2440 = 4240), Pune (1800 + 1900 = 3700), Kolkata (2000 + 1600 = 3600). Ahmedabad is maximum.

questions.original_question: If 2x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- 7x + 5 = 0, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(x^3+\frac{125}{8x^3}\)</span>&nbsp;?

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समीकरण 2x² -7x +5 = 0 को हल करने पर, हम x + 5/(2x) = 7/2 प्राप्त करते हैं। दोनों ओर घन करके x³ + 125/(8x³) = 16 5/8 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Radha saves x% of her income. If her income increases by 28% and the expenditure increases by 20%, then her savings&nbsp;increase by 40%. What is the value of x ?

english.explanation: Let income = I. New savings = 1.4*(xI/100). Solve 1.28I - 1.2*(I - xI/100) = 1.4*(xI/100). Simplify to find x = 40.

hindi.explanation: माना राधा की आय I है। बचत x%I है। आय में 28% वृद्धि होने पर नई आय 1.28I होती है। व्यय में 20% वृद्धि होने पर नया व्यय 1.2(I - xI/100) होता है। बचत में 40% वृद्धि होने पर x = 40% प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression:</p>

<p>7&nbsp;&times; 4&nbsp;&divide; 21 of 4 - 5&nbsp;&divide; 4&nbsp;&times; (9 - 13) + 2 - 2&nbsp;&divide; 8</p>

If sin<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&theta; - cos<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&theta; - 3 sin&nbsp;&theta; + 2 = 0, 0&deg; &lt;&nbsp;&theta; &lt; 90&deg;, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{\sqrt{\sec\theta-\tan\theta}}\)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Solve sin²θ - cos²θ - 3 sinθ + 2 = 0. Find θ = 30°. Compute 1/√(secθ - tanθ) = 3^{1/4} = √[4]{3}.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समीकरण को हल करने पर θ = 30° मिलता है। 1/√(secθ - tanθ) का मान √[4]{3} होता है।

questions.original_question: Find the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{tan^230^\circ}{sec^230^\circ}+\frac{cosec^245^\circ}{cot^245^\circ}-\frac{sec^260^\circ}{cosec^260^\circ}\)</span>

english.explanation: Calculate each term using trigonometric values: tan²30°/sec²30° = 1/4, cosec²45°/cot²45° = 2, sec²60°/cosec²60° = 3. Total = 1/4 + 2 - 3 = -3/4.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक शब्द की गणना करने पर: tan²30/sec²30 = 1/4, cosec²45/cot²45 = 2, sec²60/cosec²60 = 3। कुल मान 1/4 + 2 -3 = -3/4 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(x+\frac{1}{x}=\frac{17}{4}, x&gt;1\)</span>&nbsp;then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(x-\frac{1}{x}\)</span>?

hindi.explanation: समीकरण x + 1/x = 17/4 का वर्ग करने पर x² + 1/x² = 257/16 मिलता है। (x - 1/x)² = 225/16, अतः x - 1/x = 15/4 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Vertices A, B,C and D of a quadrilateral ABCD lie on a circle. &ang;A is three times &ang;C and &ang;D is two times &ang;B. What is the difference between the measures of &ang;D and &ang;C?&nbsp;

english.explanation: In cyclic quadrilateral, ∠A + ∠C = 180°, ∠B + ∠D = 180°. Solve 3x + x = 180° ⇒ x = 45°, and 2y + y = 180° ⇒ y = 60°. Difference ∠D - ∠C = 120° - 45° = 75°.

questions.original_question: In an examination, the average score of a student was 67.6. If he would have got 27 more marks in Mathematics, 10 more marks in Computer Science, 18 more marks in History and retained the same marks in other subjects, then his average score would have been 72.6. How many papers were there in the examination?

english.explanation: Total marks increase = 27 + 10 + 18 = 55. Increase in average = 5. Number of papers = 55 / 5 = 11.

hindi.explanation: अतिरिक्त अंकों का योग 27 + 10 + 18 = 55 है। औसत वृद्धि 5 है। कुल प्रश्नपत्रों की संख्या 55/5 = 11 है।

questions.original_question: Pipes A and B can fill a tank in 12 hours and 16 hours respectively and pipe C can empty the full tank in 24 hours. All three pipes are opened together, but after 4 hours pipe B is closed. In how many hours, the empty tank will be completely filled?

english.explanation: In 4 hours, all pipes fill 5/12. Remaining 7/12 filled by A and C at 1/24 per hour. Time = 7/12 ÷ 1/24 = 14 hours. Total time = 4 + 14 = 18.

hindi.explanation: पाइपों की दक्षता की गणना करने पर, पहले 4 घंटे में 5/12 भरा जाता है। शेष 7/12 को भरने में 14 घंटे लगते हैं। कुल समय 4 + 14 = 18 घंटे है।

questions.original_question: If x is a real quantity, what is the minimum value of (25 cos<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;x + 9 sec<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;x)?

english.explanation: Use AM-GM inequality: 25cos²x + 9sec²x ≥ 2√(25*9) = 30. Minimum occurs when cos²x = 9/25 ⇒ x = 3/5.

hindi.explanation: व्यंजक 25cos²x + 9sec²x का न्यूनतम मान AM-GM असमानता के अनुसार 2×√(25×9) = 30 है।

questions.original_question: In&nbsp;&Delta; ABC, &ang;A = 50&deg;. If the bisectors of the angle B and angle C, meet at a point O, then &ang;BOC is equal to:

english.explanation: In triangle ABC, ∠BOC = 90° + (∠A)/2. ∠A = 50°, so ∠BOC = 90 + 25 = 115°.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज के कोण BOC का मान 90° + (A/2) सूत्र के अनुसार 90° + 25° = 115° है।

questions.original_question: A circle is inscribed in a quadrilateral ABCD, touching sides AB, BC CD and DA at P, Q, R and S, respectively. If AS = 6 cm, BC = 12 cm, and CR = 5 cm, then the length of AB (in cm) is:

english.explanation: In a tangential quadrilateral, the sum of the lengths of any two opposite sides is equal to the sum of the other two. Using the tangent segment properties: AP = AS = 6 cm, BP = BQ, CQ = CR = 5 cm, DR = DS. Given BC = 12 cm, BQ + CQ = 12 => BQ = 7 cm. Then AB = AP + BP = 6 + 7 = 13 cm.

hindi.explanation: एक अन्तर्वृत्त युक्त चतुर्भुज में, स्पर्श बिंदु से निकले रेखाखंड समान होते हैं। इसलिए, AS = AP = 6 सेमी, CR = CQ = 5 सेमी, और BC = BQ + QC = 12 सेमी। अतः BQ = 7 सेमी और BP = BQ = 7 सेमी। अब AB = AP + BP = 6 + 7 = 13 सेमी।

questions.original_question: If the 5 - digit number 593ab is divisible by 3, 7 and 11, then what is the value of (a<sup>2</sup> - b<sup>2</sup> + ab)?&nbsp;

english.explanation: The number 593ab must be divisible by LCM(3,7,11)=231. The only multiple of 231 between 59300 and 59399 is 59367. Thus, ab = 67, so a=6, b=7. Compute a² - b² + ab = 36 - 49 + 42 = 29.

questions.original_question: A sum of Rs. 25600 is invested on simple interest partly at 7% per annum and the remaining at 9% per annum. The total interest at the end of 3 years is Rs. 5832. How much money (in Rs.) was invested at 9% per annum?

english.explanation: Let x be the amount invested at 9%. Total interest: 0.09x*3 + 0.07(25600 - x)*3 = 5832. Simplifying: 0.27x + 0.21(25600 - x) = 5832. Solving gives x = 7600.

questions.original_question: A fruit merchant bought some bananas. One fifth of them got rotten and were thrown away. He sold two-fifth of the remaining bananas with him at 15% profit and the rest remaining bananas at 10% profit. Find his overall loss or profit percent?

english.explanation: Assume original bananas = 5 units. After 1/5 rotten: 4 units left. Sold 2/5 of remaining (8/5 units) at 15% profit and 12/5 units at 10% profit. Total SP = 1.84 + 2.64 = 4.48. Loss = (5 - 4.48)/5 * 100 = 10.4%.

questions.original_question: In festival season, a shopkeeper allows a discount of 10% on every item. Even after giving the discount, he makes a profit of 20%. If he does not give any discount, then what will be his profit percent? (correct to 2 decimal places)

english.explanation: Let marked price be 100. After 10% discount, SP = 90. Profit is 20%, so CP = 75. If no discount, SP = 100. Profit% = (25/75)*100 = 33.33%.

hindi.explanation: माना क्रय मूल्य (CP) = 100 रुपये, अंकित मूल्य (MP) = x। 10% छूट देने पर विक्रय मूल्य (SP) = 0.9x = 120 (20% लाभ) → x = 133.33। कोई छूट नहीं देने पर लाभ = 33.33%।

questions.original_question: In triangle ABC, AD is the bisector of &ang;A. If AB = 5 cm, AC = 7.5 cm and BC = 10 cm, then what is the distance of D from the mid-point of BC (in cm)?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Using the angle bisector theorem, BD/DC = AB/AC = 2/3. With BC = 10, BD = 4, DC = 6. Coordinates of D are (4,0). Midpoint of BC is (5,0). Distance is 1 cm.

hindi.explanation: कोण समद्विभाजक प्रमेय से BD/DC = AB/AC = 5/7.5 = 2/3। BC = 10 सेमी → BD = 4 सेमी, DC = 6 सेमी। मध्य-बिंदु M से D की दूरी = 5 - 4 = 1 सेमी।

questions.original_question: The fourth proportion to 12, 18, 6 is equal to the third proportion to 4, k. What is the value of k?

english.explanation: Fourth proportion to 12, 18, 6 is 9. Third proportion to 4, k is k²/4. Equate to 9: k²/4 = 9 => k = 6.
Calculate non-salary income for each. Amit: 8800 (25.14% of 35000), Nitin: 7400 (25.52% of 29000). Both exceed 25%.

hindi.explanation: वेतन के अलावा आय की गणना करे: अमित (6000 + 1000 + 1800) = 8800, जो 35000 का 25.14% है (25% से अधिक नहीं)। सभी अन्य कर्मचारियों के लिए यह मान 25% से कम है।

questions.original_question: A boat covers a round trip journey between two points A and B in a river in T hours. If its speed in still water becomes 2&nbsp;times, it would take&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{80}{161}\)</span>&nbsp;T&nbsp;hours for the same journey. Find the ratio of its speed in still water to the speed of the river.

english.explanation: Set up equations for original and new trip times. Solve 4/(4u² - v²) = 160/(161(u² - v²)). Simplify to find u/v = 11/1.

hindi.explanation: माना नदी की गति v, शांत जल में नाव की गति u है। राउंड ट्रिप का समय T = d/(u+v) + d/(u-v)। गति 2u होने पर समय T' = d/(2u+v) + d/(2u-v) = (80/161)T। समीकरण हल करने पर u:v = 11:1।

english.explanation: Calculate total marks in E for Amit, Abhi, Anuj: 357. Total in B: 332. Percentage increase = (25/332)*100 ≈7.5%.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>On cloud nine&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'on cloud nine' is used to describe a state of extreme happiness or elation. The other options do not align with the figurative meaning of this idiom.

Sentence A introduces the topic (ICT tools). Sentence B explains their impact. Sentence D elaborates on the effect (communication becomes faster and easier). Sentence C concludes with the result (relaxed life). The correct order is A→B→D→C.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>He gave Kaveri a beautiful yellow dress.</p>

options.value: Kaveri was given a beautiful yellow dress by him.
Kaveri has given a beautiful yellow dress by him.
Kaveri is given a beautiful yellow dress by him.
Kaveri has been given a beautiful yellow dress by him.

english.correct_answer: 1. Kaveri was given a beautiful yellow dress by him.
english.explanation: In passive voice, the object 'Kaveri' becomes the subject, and the verb shifts to 'was given.' The active voice's object 'a beautiful yellow dress' becomes the passive object. Option 1 correctly follows passive voice structure.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>If you are not able to go out, <u>did not worry</u>.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The underlined phrase 'did not worry' is in the past tense, but the context requires a present tense imperative for advice. 'Do not worry' (option 4) is grammatically correct.

The conversation begins with the Inspector asking a question (A), followed by the Guard's response (D), then the Inspector's next question (C), and the Guard's final answer (B). The correct sequence is A→D→C→B.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Draw the line at something&nbsp;</p>

options.value: Accept something up to a particular point

english.correct_answer: 3. Accept something up to a particular point
english.explanation: The idiom 'draw the line at something' means to accept something only up to a certain limit. The other options do not match this definition.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>Several prominent film stars / have appeared on television / on behalf of awareness / about hand hygiene.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'on behalf of awareness' is grammatically incorrect. The correct phrase should be 'in favor of awareness' or 'for awareness.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in indirect speech.</strong></p>

<p>The counter clerk asked the visitor, &ldquo;What is your name?&rdquo;&nbsp;</p>

options.value: The counter clerk asks the visitor your name.&nbsp;
The counter clerk has asked the visitor his name.
The counter clerk is asking the visitor your name.&nbsp;
The counter clerk asked the visitor his name.

english.correct_answer: 4. The counter clerk asked the visitor his name.
english.explanation: In indirect speech, the question 'What is your name?' becomes 'asked his name.' The subject changes to 'his' (referring to the visitor) and the tense remains in past simple.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A musical composition made up of a series of songs or short pieces</p>

english.explanation: A 'medley' is a musical composition consisting of a series of different pieces or songs. The other options do not fit the definition.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>We are bewildered by the power which science has suddenly placed in our laps, and we are _______ by the realisation of our unpreparedness to deal with a crisis.</p>

english.explanation: 'Humbled' means to feel the reality of one's limitations, which fits the context of unpreparedness. 'Condemned,' 'proud,' and 'demeaned' do not align with the meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Banner</p>

english.explanation: A 'banner' is a large cloth or poster used for display. 'Poster' is the most direct synonym among the options.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Petete' is a misspelling of the correct word 'petite.' The other options are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>The government has hardened its ______ against the agitators and imposed a curfew in the area.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'marched fearless' is incorrect. The adverb 'fearlessly' should be used to modify the verb 'marched.'

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Esscalator' is a misspelling of 'escalator.' The correct spelling has two 's' letters followed by 'c'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>&nbsp;The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>The army / marched fearless / towards / the enemy cantonment.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'marched fearless' incorrectly uses an adjective. The adverb 'fearlessly' should be used to modify the verb 'marched.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Fecund</p>

english.explanation: The word 'fecund' means fertile or productive. Its antonym would be 'barren,' which directly means unproductive or infertile. The other options (genial, polite, rude) do not relate to fertility or productivity.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Absolve</p>

english.explanation: 'Absolve' means to free someone from blame or guilt, which is synonymous with 'pardon.' The other options (accuse, condemn, attack) contradict the meaning of 'absolve.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Harmony</p>

english.explanation: 'Harmony' refers to agreement or peaceful coexistence. Its antonym is 'hatred,' which represents intense dislike. Options like 'peace' and 'friendship' are related to harmony but not direct antonyms.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>The state of being subject to death</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'the state of being subject to death' is best captured by 'mortality.' 'Morbidity' refers to illness, 'deadly' is an adjective, and 'immortality' is the opposite meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>&nbsp;Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>What were the examples that the writer <u>gave to proved his point</u>?</p>

english.explanation: The verb 'proved' is incorrect because the infinitive 'to prove' is needed after 'gave to.' Option 3 corrects the error while maintaining the past tense ('gave').

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no.1.

english.explanation: 'Refers' is the correct verb to indicate that a term or phrase is being discussed in relation to something else. The other options (connects, seems, means) do not fit the context of definition or reference.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no.2.

english.explanation: The phrase 'refers to the example of' is grammatically correct. 'Of' is used to link a reference to a specific instance or example.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no.3.

english.explanation: 'Separate' fits if the context involves distinct or independent parts. The other options (sudden, several, useful) do not convey the idea of division or distinction.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no.4.

english.explanation: 'Gradually' indicates a slow process, which aligns with contexts like gradual change or development. The other options (frequently, properly, purposely) imply repetition, correctness, or intention, which are unrelated.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no..5

english.explanation: 'Glaciers' is the correct answer if the context involves ice formations, such as melting or environmental impact. The other options (lakes, mountains, rivers) are unrelated to ice in this context.
